abilities.name: Absolute Magic Control
abilities.description: Cid possesses unparalleled control over his magic, allowing him to manipulate it with surgical precision for healing, combat, and crafting slime suits.

abilities.name: Master Swordsmanship
abilities.description: Having trained relentlessly in two lives, his swordsmanship is a culmination of countless styles, making him virtually unbeatable in close combat.

abilities.name: I Am Atomic
abilities.description: His ultimate technique. By compressing an immense amount of magical energy and releasing it in a controlled explosion, he can obliterate entire cities.

abilities.name: Tactical Deception
abilities.description: A master of role-playing and improvisation. He effortlessly manipulates events and people to fit his 'Eminence in Shadow' persona, often by accident.

allies.name: Alpha
allies.title: The First
allies.description: The first member and the de facto second-in-command of Shadow Garden. A brilliant leader and strategist who manages the organization's vast operations.

allies.name: Beta
allies.title: The Second
allies.description: A meticulous archivist and author who chronicles Shadow's 'adventures' as heroic sagas. She is deeply devoted and highly capable.

allies.name: Gamma
allies.title: The Third
allies.description: Possessing a brilliant mind for business and logistics, Gamma is the financial backbone of Shadow Garden through the Mitsugoshi Corporation. She is notoriously clumsy in combat.

allies.name: Delta
allies.title: The Fourth
allies.description: A beastkin with overwhelming strength and feral instincts. Her combat prowess is exceptional, though her approach is often direct and destructive.

allies.name: Epsilon
allies.title: The Fifth
allies.description: A master of magic control, specializing in her slime bodysuit to create a 'perfect' physique. She is prideful and a fierce combatant.

allies.name: Zeta
allies.title: The Sixth
allies.description: A beastkin spy and assassin who operates in the shadows. She is stoic, highly independent, and unquestioningly loyal to Shadow.

allies.name: Eta
allies.title: The Seventh
allies.description: A genius architect and researcher. She is often absorbed in her work and is responsible for many of Shadow Garden's technological advancements.
